subject: Re: [junit] Re: Ten Years of Test Driven Development
msgSnippet: I m not Steve (I m the other guy) but it will be at QCon in London. Michael
messageBody:
I'm not Steve (I'm the other guy) but it will be at QCon in London.

Michael

-----Original Message-----
>From: Johannes Link <jl@...>
>Sent: Jan 2, 2009 2:50 PM
>To: junit@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [junit] Re: Ten Years of Test Driven Development
>
>Steve,
>
>I appreciate you giving me some homework over the holidays :-)
>
>When are the two of you supposed to give this talk?
>
>Johannes
>
>--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Steve Freeman <smgfreeman@...> wrote:
>>
>> Michael Feathers and I are working up a talk that will be a review of
>> effectively 10 years of TDD. The idea is partly just to look at the
>> history, but mainly to consider what we've learned over all this time.
>>
